com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities

Class ParserUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.ParserUtilities

  • public class ParserUtilities
extends Object
    Contains a number of utility methods that can be used by parsers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ActionParameter createParameter(String value, Configuration configuration)
      Creates either an expression, a constant, or a compound action parameter from a textual value, depending on whether the text contains expressions or not.
      static SortedMap<ExpressionOccurrence,ExpressionFactory> getExpressionOccurrences(String text, Configuration configuration)
      Analyses a text and splits it in into contiguous blocks of characters with optional expression factories attached to them.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createParameter

        public static ActionParameter createParameter(String value,
                              Configuration configuration)
                                       throws AluminumException
        Creates either an expression, a constant, or a compound action parameter from a textual value, depending on whether the text contains expressions or not.
        Parameters:
        value - the textual parameter value
        configuration - the configuration that contains all expression factories
        Returns:
        the new action parameter
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the parameter can't be created

      • getExpressionOccurrences

        public static SortedMap<ExpressionOccurrence,ExpressionFactory> getExpressionOccurrences(String text,
                                                                         Configuration configuration)
                                                                                  throws AluminumException
        Analyses a text and splits it in into contiguous blocks of characters with optional expression factories attached to them. The occurrences that are not connected with an expression factory are not expressions, but should be treated as text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to find occurrences of expressions in
        configuration - the configuration that contains all expression factories
        Returns:
        a map that contains a number of blocks; each block is either text or an expression
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the given text contains overlapping expressions
